TopicTitle: Why KSP exist in this world ?

Articles.Content: What you think is the main reason for KSP to exist ?
It was a good idea for the game to be made.
Imagination for the main reason I guess. And probably because we are just grasping the idea of space and still have no idea what we are doing on this planet.

I believe that is "point, set, match"

Well played Joshwoo69.

It is a good enrichment tool for the young and might inspire some to get involved with space exploration. However, it does mostly focus on aerospace engineering and does limit the enrichment. It is a good game none the less.
It was given to us by Squad, and we are thankful.

For the same reason that every other commercial game exists.

To earn money for the devs, and give joy to the players.

Why shouldn't KSP exist? There are no reasons, that's why.

KSP started as a little project for Squad and simply exploded into a full-blown game due to popularity. For that we should all be thankful for.
